preconditions.precondition: An actor wants to create a new cloud resource.

mainSequence.step: Actor performs c3-cloud-create operation through CLI to create a cloud with name and type.
CLI sends a request to cloud service to create a cloud with the specified name and type.
Actor uses a web interface to create a cloud with the specified name and type.
Web application sends a request to cloud service to create a cloud with the provided name and type.
